content: this pattern is also available for free here https //spinayarncrochet com/snowman-ornament-free-crochet-pattern-2/ this snowman ornament measures approximately 10cm/4 from top to bottom any worsted weight yarn can be used the face is worked in flat panels and the hat is worked in the round if you d prefer to skip the scarf you can simply stitch on a mouth instead please note the pattern for the holly leaf embellishment is not included however it can be found on the attic 24 website
